data.comment: The match has started at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Metz in the half of Angers.
Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Angers's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Metz close to the penalty box.
In the minute 3, Aurelien Petit signals a Metz throw-in in Angers's half.
Angers to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Aurelien Petit awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Metz will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Angers.
Angers's Angelo Fulgini misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 9, Metz have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Angers have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 10, Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Angers.
Angers have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Metz are whistled for offside.
Throw-in Metz.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Free kick in a good position for Metz!
In the minute 14, Angers's Souleyman Doumbia has been booked in Angers.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Aurelien Petit awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Metz at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Metz just outside Angers's area.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Angers.
In the minute 21, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Angers drive upfield and Thomas Mangani gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Metz defender.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 23, Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a Angers throw-in in Metz's half.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Angers.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Metz to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
In the minute 27, Metz are coming forward and Victorien Angban gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Metz needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
Aurelien Petit signals a throw-in for Angers, close to Metz's area.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 29, Metz surge into the attack at Stade Raymond Kopa but John Boyeâ€™s header is off-target.
Aurelien Petit awards Angers a goal kick.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In the minute 31, Angers are caught offside.
Free kick for Metz in the half of Angers.
Matthieu Udol of Metz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 36, Free kick Metz.
Romain Thomas (Angers) gets a yellow card.
An attacking Angers player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 37, Angelo Fulgini (Angers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Thomas Mangani smashes in a penalty at Stade Raymond Kopa. The score is now 1-0.
Matthieu Udol (Metz) has received a yellow card from Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 39, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Opa Nguette.
Lamine Gueye instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Angers in the half of Metz.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Opa Nguette of Metz gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Aurelien Petit will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Aurelien Petit has blown to start the second-half.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Angers make their first substitution with Vincent Manceau replacing Abdoulaye Bamba.
The home team replace Souleyman Doumbia with Enzo Ebosse.
In the minute 46, Stephane Moulin is making the team's third substitution at Stade Raymond Kopa with Jimmy Cabot replacing Pierrick Capelle.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Angers needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Throw-in Angers.
In the minute 54, Angers have a goal kick.
Angers are pushing forward but Lois Diony's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
In the minute 55, Throw-in high up the field for Angers in Angers.
Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 60, Sada Thioub is on a sub for Sofiane Boufal for Angers.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 62, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 67, In Angers Angers drive forward through Jimmy Cabot. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Metz have a dangerous throw-in.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Youssef Maziz is replacing Warren Tchimbembe for Metz at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Ismael Traore for Angers has been booked by Aurelien Petit and receives a first yellow card.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Angers.
Aurelien Petit signals a Metz throw-in in Angers's half.
Angers drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Aurelien Petit signals a throw-in for Angers, close to Metz's area.
Rachid Alioui is replacing Lois Diony for the home team.
In the minute 77, Throw-in Metz.
The away team have replaced Opa Nguette with Pape Ndiaga Yade. This is the second substitution made today by Frederic Antonetti.
Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Angers.
Angelo Fulgini (Angers) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 80, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Angers to check on John Boye, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 83, Metz have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
The away team replace John Boye with Kiki.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
At Stade Raymond Kopa, Vincent Pajot has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 86, Angelo Fulgini (Angers) has received a yellow card from Aurelien Petit.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Metz to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Angers needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Angers.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Metz drives forward and Farid Boulaya gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Can Angers capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
